Transcription for 548080

T
While a rose, see the twelfth year's glow of myre,
Our right wing, the young and choir,
Were impressed in my dream,
Were impressed in my dream.
Silent night, holy night,
All is calm, all is right,
Round yon virgin, mother and child,
Holy infant so tender and mild,
Sleep in heavenly peace,
Sleep in heavenly peace.
Silent night, holy night,
Son of God, last your life,
Radiant peace from thy holy face,
With the dawn of redeeming grace,
Jesus, Lord at thy birth,
Jesus, Lord at thy birth.
